page.title: 07MISSON DIALECT
page.content: In Misson we have different ways of saying different things such as :- Misson Feeds and Storage - Croppies, Old quarry - sand hills, old quarry - dump, Coronation Avenue - avo, Manor Close - New estate, Post Office - Birtwhistles, Birties, Central Stores - Marsdens, Sluice - slush, our house - are ouse, Vicar Lane - Back Lane, Moat - Blackberry Island, Doncaster - Donny town, Sutcliffs farm - Sutties house,football pitch - togger pitch, quarry - quaz, thankyou - thanks, ta, Idle stop - old station, give - gizs, youth club - youthy, think - stink, mess about - doss around, food - grub or nosh.
